author: Seongjoon Cho
title: Trump, South Korea president to meet at White House on May 22
text:
Trump, South Korea president to meet at White House on May 22 President Donald Trump will host South Korean President Moon Jae-in at the White House on May 22. The two will discuss the upcoming summit between Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, the White House said on Friday. Published 17 Hours Ago Reuters SeongJoon Cho | Bloomberg | Getty Images President Donald Trump, left, shakes hands with Moon Jae-in, South Korea's president, during a news conference at the presidential Blue House in Seoul, South Korea, on Tuesday, Nov. 7, 2017.
President Donald Trump will host South Korean President Moon Jae-in at the White House on May 22, and the two will discuss the upcoming summit between Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , the White House said on Friday.
